definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fall upon, startle, terrify (Ar. baga3a come or happen suddenly, NH [[בָּעִת]] Hiph. startle; so Aram. [[בְּעֵת]] Pa. b9et Aph.)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: (late prose) Pf. [[נִבְעַת]] 1Ch 21:30, [[נִבְעָָת]] Es 7:6; [[נִבְעַתִּי]] Da 8:17; —be terrified, abs. Da 8:17; c. [[מפני]] 1Ch 21:30, Es 7:6.

fall upon 1Sa 16:14, 1Sa 16:15 (only here in prose); overwhelm Job 3:5 (cf. [[לקח]] v:Job 3:6) Job 9:34, Job 13:11 (‖[[פחד נפל על]]) v:Job 3:21 (cf. ‖) Job 15:24 (‖[[תקף]]) Job 18:11 (‖[[הפיץ]]) Job 33:7 (‖[[כבד על]]) Is 21:4; assail Ps 18:5 = 2Sa 22:5.
